name: Masca chirurgicala 1810F
enfullDescription:
Surgical Mask 1810F is a flat pleated tie-on mask fulfilling the performance requirements for Type II surgical masks according to EN 14683. The mask is made of blue polypropylene nonwoven for the outer coverstock, a white polypropylene filter medium and a white polypropylene nonwoven for the inner coverstock. The mask has an aluminum nosepiece wire inserted and tie strings attached for fastening the mask. All attachments and closures on the mask are ultrasonically welded (tie tapes and top/bottom bindings). The mask is not sterile and is bulk packaged into dispenser boxes.

Outer Coverstock: Polypropylene Nonwoven, blue 
Filer Medium: Polypropylene, white
Inner Coverstock: Polypropylene Nonwoven, white
Nosepiece: Aluminium

Available: box with 100 pieces
smallDescription: Masca plata cu snururi de legare
fullDescription:
Masca chirurgicala 1810F este o masca plata cu snururi de legare care indeplineste cerintele de performanta pentru mastile chirurgicale de tip II conform EN 14683. Masca este confectionata dintr-un material netesut albastru de polipropilena pentru acoperirea exterioara, un mediu filtrant din polipropilena alba si o tesatura alba din polipropilena pentru partea din interior. Masca are o lamela nazala din aluminiu introdusa si snururi de legare atasate pentru fixarea perfecta a mastii. Toate atasamentele si cusaturile de pe masca sunt sudate cu ultrasunete (benzi de legatura si snururi legare sus/jos). Masca nu este sterila si este ambalata vrac in cutii.

Acoperirea exterioara: Polipropilena netesut, albastru
Mediu filtrant: Polipropilena, alb
Acoperirea interioara: Polipropilena netesut, alb 
Lamela nasala: Aluminiu

Disponibil: cutie cu 100 bucati
seoDescription: Hamilton C1 aparat ventilatie mecanica de la Hamilton Medical acopera cerintele sectiei de terapie intensiva. Terapie cu oxigen neonatali, pediatrici si adulti.

name: Masca respiratorie 8710
enfullDescription:
The 3M Disposable Respirator 8710 provides lightweight, comfortable and effective protection against dust and mist. The convex shape, twin strap design, nose foam and nose clip ensure comfortable wear over a range of face sizes.

Durable, collapse resistant inner shell.
P1 rated filter to AS/NZ 1716:2012

Available in boxes with 20 masks
smallDescription: Impotriva prafului si a aburilor
fullDescription:
Masca de protectie respiratorie de unica folosinta 8710 este usoara, confortabila si eficienta impotriva prafului si a aburilor. Forma convexa, designul cu benzi duble, lamela din spuma si clema pentru nas asigura o purtare confortabila pentru orice dimensiune a fetei.

Interiorul mastii durabile, rezistenta la strivire.
Filtru P1 evaluat la AS/NZ 1716:2012

Disponibil in cutie cu 20 de masti
seoDescription: Hamilton C6 de la Hamilton Medical este un ventilator cu moduri de ventilatie adaptive cu protectie pulmonara si control integrat al presiunii. Umidificator incorporat.

name: Aura 9320+
enfullDescription:
The 3M Aura Particulate Respirator 9320+ provide effective respiratory protection for use in industries where workers will be exposed to dust particles and/or non-volatile liquid particles.

Tested and CE Approved to EN 149:2001+A1:2009
Foldable, easy to store, proprietary 3-panel design accommodates facial movement for wearer comfort
Low breathing resistance filter technology gives effective filtration with low breathing resistance for consistent high quality performance
Sculpted nose panel conforms to the nose and contours of the face and helps improve compatibility with 3M eyewear
Innovative chin tab designed for ease of donning and adjustment to help achieve a comfortable fit
3M Cool Flow exhalation valve offers improved comfort in hot humid environments and/or where work is hard and physical
Embossed top panel helps reduce fogging of eyewear
Individual hygienic packaging helps protect the respirator from contamination before use
Large, soft nose foam is comfortable on the skin
smallDescription: Masca respiratorie impotriva particulelor
fullDescription:
Masca de protectie respiratorie impotriva particulelor 3M Aura 9320+ asigura o protectie respiratorie eficienta in ceea ce priveste utilizarea in cadrul ramurilor industriale in care lucratorii sunt expusi la particule de praf si/sau particule lichide non-volatile.

Testata si Aprobata CE conform EN149:2001+A1:2009
Pliabila, usor de utilizat, designul patentat cu trei segmente se adapteaza miscarilor faciale ale purtatorului, asigurand astfel un nivel ridicat de confort
Filtrul este conceput tehnologic pentru a asigura un nivel eficient de filtrare in conditiile unei rezistente reduse la respiratie, cu scopul de a garanta o performanta inalta de-a lungul timpului
Lamela nazala se adapteaza conturului nasului si a fetei si contribuie la imbunatatirea compatibilitatii cu ochelarii de protectie 3M
Sectiunea inovativa pentru barbie este conceputa pentru facilitatea echiparii mastii si ajustarii pozitiei acesteia, astfel incat sa se obtina un nivel confortabil de potrivire
Supapa de expiratie 3M Coolflow ofera un nivel de confort suplimentar in mediile in care exista umezeala si temperaturi ridicate si/sau unde lucrul se desfasoara in conditii grele, care presupun munca fizica
Sectiunea presata de deasupra contribuie la reducerea efectului de aburire a ochelarilor de protectie
Ambalajul propriu igienic contribuie la protejarea mastii respiratorii de surse de contaminare inaintea utilizarii
Sectiunea neteda spongioasa pentru nas se simte confortabil pe piele
seoDescription: Hamilton T1 optim pentru transportul de urgenta aerian, maritim sau cu salvarea a pacientilor critici.

Puncture Cannulas made of stainless steel

2-part or 3-part
For 2-step or 3-step procedures
Sterile, single use
Latex-free
smallDescription: Pentru proceduri in 2 pasi si 3 pasi
fullDescription:
Ace de punctie din otel inoxidabil
Marcaj ultrasunete la varf (3 inele de marcaj)
2 parti sau 3 parti
Pentru proceduri in 2 pasi si 3 pasi
seoDescription: Ventilatorul Hamilton MR1 este ideal pentru RMN, cu o varientate de circuite respiratorii.

name: Actilite
enSmallDescription: Non-adherent viscose net dressing coated with 99% Manuka honey and 1% Manuka oil
enfullDescription:
Actilite is a light viscose net dressing coated with antibacterial Manuka honey & Manuka oil. The dressing is designed to protect a wound, promote healing and allow the passage of exudate. 
The antibacterial effect of Actilite has been enhanced by combining high grade antibacterial Manuka oil with Manuka honey.

The combination of Manuka honey and Manuka oil has been demonstrated in-vitro to be effective against a number of major wound infecting organisms including MRSA, VRE and Providentia stuartii.
Actilite can also be used under Negative Pressure Wound Therapy (NPWT) or a primary layer to 
reduce bacterial burden.

Indications: cuts, abrasions, burns, surgical wounds, leg ulcers, pressure ulcers, diabetic ulcers, infected wounds

CR4281 - 5cm x 5cm  
CR3849 - 10cm x 10cm  
CR3852 - 10cm x 20cm
smallDescription: Pansamente cu 99% miere de Manuka si 1% ulei de Manuka
fullDescription:
Pansamentele Actilite, subtiri si non-aderente, cu 99% miere de Manuka si 1% ulei de Manuka, antimicrobiene si cu efect osmotic si de stimulare a vindecarii plagii, sunt dedicate unei game largi de plagi, de la abraziuni tegumentare si arsuri, pana la ulcere diabetice, de presiune sau venoase, inclusiv pentru plagi chirurgicale.
Au efect antimicrobian asupra unei game extinse de germeni, inclusiv MRSA si VRE.
Utilizabile pentru pacienti de toate varstele si in cadrul terapiei cu presiune negativa.
Disponibile in diferite dimensiuni. Pot fi mentinute pana la 7 zile.
seoDescription: Ventilatorul Hamilton C3 cu ASV pentru oxigenarea optima a pacientului.

name: Tub Activon
enfullDescription:
Activon Tube contains 100% Manuka honey with no additives from New Zealand. Our Manuka honey is 
filtered and sterilised, making it suitable for application to wounds. Manuka honey will de-bride and de-slough, eliminate odours and provides a moist wound healing environment.

Activon Tube is ideal for debriding necrotic tissue, or for topping up dressings where the honey has been washed away by exudate. Great for using in cavities, just wash away with saline solution.

Indications: pressure ulcers, leg ulcers, diabetic ulcers, surgical wounds, burns, graft sites, infected wounds, cavity wounds

CR3830 - 25g tube
smallDescription: Tub cu miere sterila de Manuka 100%
fullDescription:
Tubul Activon contine 25g de miere de Manuka 100%, filtrata si sterilizata, fara aditivi, cu efect antimicrobian, osmotic, de reducere a mirosurilor din plaga, eficienta in debridare si cu rol de stimulare in vindecarea plagilor. Are o gama extinsa de indicatii de utilizare, de la arsuri, ulcere diabetice sau venoase, pana la plagi chirurgicale, cavitare si infectate, inclusiv pentru zonele de graft.
Cu eficienta dovedita asupra unui numar mare de germeni, inclusiv MRSA si VRE.
seoDescription: Vantilator mecanic medin CNO pentru nou-nascuti si pediatrici cu toate modurile de ventilatie.

name: Activon Tulle
enSmallDescription: Knitted viscose mesh impregnated with 100% Manuka honey
enfullDescription:
Activon Tulle is a knitted viscose mesh primary dressing impregnated with Manuka honey. Activon Tulle creates a moist healing environment and effectively eliminates wound odour whilst providing antibacterial action.
Activon Tulle is ideally selected for granulating or shallow wounds, it’s a good choice when debriding or de-sloughing small areas of necrotic or sloughy tissue.

Indications: leg ulcers, diabetic ulcers, pressure sores, malodorous wounds, dry, sloughy or necrotic wounds, infected wounds

CR3761 - 5cm x 5cm  
CR3658 - 10cm x 10cm
smallDescription: Mesa de tip tesatura din vascoza impregnata cu miere de Manuka 100%
fullDescription:
Mesele de tip tesatura din vascoza Activon Tulle sunt impregnate cu miere de Manuka 100% si creeaza un mediu umed optim pentru vindecarea plagilor, eliminand microsurile din plaga si au rol antimicrobian, cu eficienta dovedita asupra unui numar mare de germeni, inclusiv MRSA si VRE. 
Reprezinta pansamentul de electie pentru plagile necrotice.
Disponibile in diferite dimensiuni. Pot fi mentinute pana la 7 zile.
seoDescription: Ventilator bebelusi prematuri si nou nascuti cu nCPAP si nHFV. Ventilatie complet neinvaziva.

name: Advazorb
enSmallDescription: Hydrophilic foam dressing with film backing
enfullDescription:
Advazorb and Advazorb Lite are soft and conformable, low-adherent, hydrophilic, polyurethane foam dressings with a breathable film backing.
A non-adherent foam dressing with excellent fluid handling properties. Ideal for use under compression bandaging with it’s fluid retention, low profile and low friction film backing. 
The Advazorb range features a waterproof film backing that prevents strike-through. The backing has been designed to reduce friction on clothes and bandages which extends dressing wear time by reducing ‘rucking’ and preventing dressings falling off.With an high MVTR the Advazorb foam range provides the ideal conditions for wound healing.

Indications: cuts and abrasions, superficial burns, surgical wounds, leg ulcers, pressure ulcers, diabetic ulcers

CR4221 - 5cm x 5cm  
CR4165 - 7.5cm x 7.5cm 
CR4166 - 10cm x 10cm 
CR4167 - 12.5cm x12.5cm
smallDescription: Pansamente absorbante din spuma de poliuretan
fullDescription:
Pansamentele absorbante Advazorb si Advazorb Lite sunt realizate din spuma moale si confortabila de poliuretan, non aderente, hidrofilice cu film de protectie perspirabil si cu proprietati de alunecare. Capacitate mare de absorbtie si retentie a exsudatului, astfel ca pot fi utilizate si sub bandaje compresive.
Disponibile in diferite dimensiuni. Pot fi mentinute pana la 7 zile.
seoDescription: medin NC3 este primul dispozitiv CPAP cu turbina pentru suportul respirator neinvaziv pentru bebelusi si nou-nascuti.

name: Advazorb Border
enSmallDescription: Hydrophilic foam dressing with soft silicone
enfullDescription:
Advazorb Border and Advazorb Border Lite are absorbent, atraumatic, self-adhesive bordered dressings with a unique perforated soft silicone wound contact layer.
The silicone wound contact layer has multiple small 2mm pores which enable the passage of exudate into the absorbent foam whilst protecting the fragile wound bed. This combination ensures the dressings comfortably stay in place whilst minimising the potential for maceration.

Suitable for acute and chronic exuding wounds including: pre-tibial lacerations, cuts and abrasions, superficial burns, surgical wounds
leg ulcers, pressure ulcers, diabetic ulcers

CR4190 - 7.5cm x 7.5cm 
CR4191 - 10cm x 10cm 
CR4192 - 12.5cm x 12.5cm 
CR4193 - 15cm x 15cm
smallDescription: Pansamente absorbante din spuma de poliuretan autoadezive
fullDescription:
Pansamentele absorbante din spuma de poliuretan Advazorb Border si Advazorb Border Lite sunt absorbante, atraumatice si autoadezive datorita stratului de contact cu plaga care este din silicon cu multiple perforatii mici si marginilor adezive. 
Stratul de silicon permite schimbarea atraumatica a pansamentului. 
Disponibile in diferite dimensiuni. Pot fi mentinute pana la 7 zile.
seoDescription: Concentrator portabil de oxigen cu capacitate de 5L, debitmetru reglabil, furtun si masca respiratie. Usor de utilizat acasa.

name: Algivon
enSmallDescription: Alginate dressing impregnated with 100% Manuka honey
enfullDescription:
Algivon is a soft alginate dressing impregnated with 100% medical grade Manuka honey. The alginate fibres enable a sustained, slower release of honey. Algivon is an ideal choice for wetter wounds as the alginate has a small capacity to absorb, meaning the honey isn’t washed away with exudate therefore staying at the wound site for longer. The dressing is very soft and conformable, ideal for cavities and debriding and de-sloughing large areas of necrotic and sloughy tissue. 

Algivon may be applied to any wound but especially: pressure ulcers, leg ulcers, diabetic ulcers, surgical wounds, burns, graft sites, infected wounds, cavity wounds and sinuses.

CR3831 - 5cm x 5cm	
CR3659 - 10cm x 10cm
smallDescription: Pansament alginat impregnat cu miere de Manuka 100%
fullDescription:
Pansamentul Algivon este de tip alginat impregnat cu miere medicinala de Manuka 100%. Fibrele de alginat ajuta la eliminarea lenta a mierii. Algivon este optiunea ideala pentru rani cu exsudat moderat pana la abundent deoarece alginatul are o capacitate mica de absorbtie, ideal pentru plagi umede. Efect antimicrobian (inclusiv pentru VRE si MRSA) si de stimulare a vindecarii plagii
Disponibil in diferite dimensiuni. Poate fi mentinut pana la 7 zile.
seoDescription: Seturile de circuite respiratorii concepute special pentru ventilatoare Hamilton Medical.

name: Algivon Plus
enSmallDescription: Reinforced alginate dressing impregnated with 100% Manuka honey
enfullDescription:
Algivon Plus is a reinforced, soft alginate dressing impregnated with 100% Medical Grade Manuka honey. The reinforced alginate fibres enable a sustained, slower release of honey whilst maintaining the integrity of the dressing. 

Algivon Plus is an ideal choice for wetter wounds as the alginate has a small capacity to absorb, meaning the honey isn’t washed away with exudates therefore staying at the wound site for longer. The dressing is very soft and conformable, ideal for debriding and de-sloughing large areas of necrotic and sloughy tissue.

Algivon Plus may be applied to any wound but especially sloughy, necrotic and malodorous wounds, including: leg ulcers, pressure ulcers, diabetic ulcers, fungating lesions, complicated surgical wounds, abrasions, infected wounds, cavity wounds

CR4230 - 5cm x 5cm  
CR4225 - 10cm x 10cm
smallDescription: Pansament alginat ranforsat  impregnat cu miere de Manuka 100%
fullDescription:
Pansamentul Algivon Plus este de tip alginat cu structura ranforsata si impregnat cu miere medicinala de Manuka 100%. Fibrele intarite de alginat ofera sustenabilitate, eliminare lenta a mierii, in timp ce se pastreaza integritatea pansamentului. Algivon Plus este optiunea ideala pentru rani cu exsudat moderat pana la abundent deoarece alginatul are o capacitate mica de absorbtie, ideal pentru curatatea ranilor mari cu tesut moale si necrotic. Efect antimicrobian (inclusiv pentru VRE si MRSA) si de stimulare a vindecarii plagii.
Disponibil in diferite dimensiuni. Poate fi mentinut pana la 7 zile.
seoDescription: Seturi de circuite respiratorii Teleflex ce ofera solutii pentru ajutorul in terapia respiratorie din spital.

name: Algivon Plus Tulle
enSmallDescription: Reinforced alginate ribbon impregnated with 100% Manuka honey
enfullDescription:
Algivon Plus Ribbon is the same reinforced, honey impregnated material as Algivon Plus but is in an easy to use ribbon shape. The ribbon features the same strengthened alginate fibres meaning it enables a slower release of honey at the wound site. 
Algivon Plus Ribbon is very soft and conformable, shaped for easy application within cavities and sinuses meaning the wound can be easily packed for direct contact with the entire wound site. The upgraded alginate allows for dressing removal in one piece.

Algivon Plus Ribbon may be applied to any wound but especially sloughy, necrotic and malodorous wounds, including: leg ulcers, pressure ulcers, diabetic ulcers, fungating lesions, complicated surgical wounds, abrasions, infected wounds, cavity wounds

CR3761 - 5cm x 5cm 
CR3658 - 10cm x 10cm
smallDescription: Pansament alginat ranforsat de tip mesa impregnat cu miere de Manuka 100%
fullDescription:
Pansamentul Algivon Plus Ribbon este de tip mesa de alginat cu structura ranforsata si impregnat cu miere medicinala de Manuka 100%. Fibrele intarite de alginat ofera sustenabilitate, eliminare lenta a mierii, in timp ce se pastreaza integritatea pansamentului. Algivon Plus este optiunea ideala pentru rani cavitare cu exsudat moderat pana la abundent deoarece alginatul are o capacitate mica de absorbtie, ideal pentru curatatea ranilor mari cu tesut moale si necrotic. Efect antimicrobian (inclusiv pentru VRE si MRSA) si de stimulare a vindecarii plagii.
Disponibil in diferite dimensiuni. In set cu dispozitiv de introducere a mesei in cavitate. Poate fi mentinut pana la 7 zile.
seoDescription: Masca cu balon resuscitare Teleflex pentru interventia de prim ajutor. Respiratie artificiala de la Hudson.

name: Umidificator AquaPak
enfullDescription:
AquaPak pre-filled humidifiers
Each clinical setting has unique requirements. Available in a full range of sizes, AquaPaK humidifiers provide the production of therapeutic moisture for this purpose only.
Full range of sizes. Sterile water available in 340ml, 540ml and 650ml, to support a variety of clinical applications.
User friendly. Each bottle incorporates an oxygen connector tube with an easy trigger design.
High moisture production. The micro-diffuser produces smaller bubbles and a larger agitation surface, to allow quiet operation and the production of therapeutic moisture.
Safe and effective. The humidifier adapter incorporates an audible alarm to warn the patient or clinician of flow restriction or occlusion in the humidifier or tubes.
smallDescription: Umidificator oxigenoterapie preumplut cu apa sterila - AquaPak
fullDescription:
Barbotor (umidificator) preumplut cu apa sterila pentru umidificarea oxigenului inspirat. Silentios, prevazut cu diuza microdifuzoare pentru producerea de microbule cu adaptor steril ce incorporeaza alarma acustica pentru situatiile de restrictionare a fluxului sau ocluziei. Cu conector incorporat pentru tubul de oxigen. Disponibil in 3 dimensiuni (340 ml, 540 ml si 650 ml). 
Disponibil si in varianta preumplut cu solutie salina 0.9%, gata de utilizare, pentru nebulizare.
seoDescription: Apa sterila AquaPak de la Teleflex furnizeaza umiditate terapeutica pentru ventilatia mecanica.

name: Sonde endotraheale cu aspiratie subglotica
enfullDescription:
The endotracheal tube chosen for initial intubation doesn’t always allow for easy access to this valuable practice - until now. Introducing the new Teleflex endotracheal tubes with subglottic suctioning. Featuring a separate suction line, this convertible endotracheal tube allows for subglottic secretion removal - when you need it. The versatile design eliminates the need to be selective during initial intubation, increasing the number of patients who can be viable candidates for subglottic suctioning, a clinically proven strategy for VAP reduction.

Convertible endotracheal tube with integrated suction port
Attachable suction line allows for subglottic secretion removal
Simplifies tube selection at initial intubation

Available in a range of sizes.
smallDescription: Sonde endotraheale cu aspiratie subglotica pentru reducerea PAV
fullDescription: Sonde endotraheale cu linie pentru aspiratia subglotica integrata in peretele sondei, pentru reducerea secretiilor subglotice si prevenirea PAV. Cu balonas cu pereti subtiri, volum mare si joasa presiune pentru realizarea unei sigilari optime la nivelul traheei, cu linie radio-opaca pentru o buna vizibilitate si o amplasare sigura. Linia de aspiratie a secretiilor prevazuta cu orificiu de deschidere deasupra balonasului si cu conector cu capacel la celalalt capat. Dimensiuni: 6.0 pana la 9.0
seoDescription: Ecograf Edge II Sonosite este un sistem cu ultrasunete care ofera o diagnoza sigura pacientilor tai.

name: Bair Hugger - Unitate de incalzire pacient cu aer cald
enfullDescription:
The 3M Bair Hugger warming unit provides the airflow required for efficient heating of the patient before and during the postoperative period, while being very quiet. It is a lightweight unit and can be easily mounted on a wall, infusion stand or flat surface.
3M Bair Hugger is a blanket warming unit adapted with 4 hot air flow temperature settings.
The unit is equipped with 3 temperature sensors and adjustable air flow to adapt to any warming needs of the patient.
smallDescription: Temperatura face diferenta
fullDescription:
Unitatea de incalzire 3M Bair Hugger asigura fluxul de aer necesar pentru o incalzire eficienta a pacientului inainte si in timpul perioadei postoperatorii, fiind in acelasi timp foarte silentiosa. Este o unitate usora si poate fi montata cu usurinta pe perete, stand de perfuzie sau o suprafata plana.
3M Bair Hugger este o unitate de incalzire paturici, adaptata cu 4 setari de temperatura ale fluxului de aer cald.
Unitatea este prevazuta cu 3 senzori de temperatura si flux de aer ajustabil pentru a adapta orice necesitate de incalzire a pacientului.
seoDescription: Ecograful Sonosite M-Turbo ofera o calitate extraordinara a imaginii si o definire clara a tesuturilor.

Whether they are made of PVC, silicone, Wirupren Material or rubber latex, the wide selection of our Rüsch and Hudson RCI rebreathing bags at your disposal meets every requirement. They all offer a reliable and safe application in approved quality, are highly comfortable for the user to wear, and are classic examples of our long tradition of serving the medical market with tried and tested quality products.

Neoprene Rebreathing Bag
Silicone Rebreathing Bag SilkoBag
Latex Rebreathing Bag

Available in a range of sizes
smallDescription: Baloane de reinhalare de unica folosinta sau reutilizabile
fullDescription: Selectia larga a gamei de baloane de reinhalare Rüsch si Hudson RCI de unica folosinta sau reutilizabile va sta la dispozitie intrunind toate necesitatile. Sunt realizate din neopren, latex sau silicon si sunt disponibile intr-o gama variata de dimensiuni (0.5 - 2.3l).
seoDescription: Ecograf portabil Sonosite SII este un sistem cu ultrasunete inteligent ce se adapteaza nevoilor complexe in imagistica.

name: Baloane de resuscitare
enSmallDescription: High performance with the convenience of a disposable product
enfullDescription:
Hudson RCI Disposable Lifesaver Resuscitators combine quality, features and performance with the convenience of a disposable product. The rightangle oxygen tubing connector swivels 360°.
The paediatric and neonate bags have a built-in pressure relief valve and a pressure monitoring port.
smallDescription: Dispozitiv de resuscitare de tip Ruben de unica folosinta
fullDescription: Dispozitiv de resuscitare de unica folosinta cu valva de eliberare a presiunii incorporata cu port de monitorizare a presiunii, deviator de flux, masca, si tub de oxigen cu conector angulat la 90 de grade rotativ.  Disponibil in 3 dimensiuni: adulti, copii, nou-nascuti.

name: Indicator biologic
enSmallDescription: Biological indicators for Steam and Ethylene Oxide processes
enfullDescription:
Browne Bio Monitors contain a stated population of bacterial spores inoculated onto filter paper and placed inside a plastic culture tube. A crushable glass ampoule contains the culture medium for release after exposure to the sterilization process.

Conforms to ISO 11138
Indicators available for Steam Processes and Ethylene Oxide Processes
smallDescription: Indicator biologic pentru sterilizarea cu abur, oxid de etilena, peroxid de hidrogen/plasma
fullDescription:
Indicatorii biologici Browne contin o populatie determinata de spori bacterieni inoculati pe hartie de filtru si plasati intr-un tub de cultura din plastic. O fiola de sticla contine mediul de cultura pentru eliberare dupa expunerea la procesul de sterilizare.

Conform cu ISO 11138
Indicatori disponibili pentru procesele cu abur, pentru procesele cu oxid de etilena si pentru cele cu peroxid de hidrogen/plasma

name: C50
enfullDescription:
The C50 patient monitor comes configured with the high acuity monitoring features that you need for the best care of your patients. The C50 bedside monitor offers a built-in handle for mounting options. This monitor is suitable for most clinical environments. Using STAR8800 software makes the C50 patient data more accessible. Pairing Spacelabs C50 multi-parameter monitor with STAR8800 enables you to easily setup a cost-effective centralized monitoring system capable of monitoring up to 128 beds wherever it is needed in the hospital.

A friendly and intuitive user interface (UI) means caregivers can quickly access vital signs whenever the data is needed. Convenient functionality such as remote NIBP start / stop, bed review, and alarm management allows your clinical staff to perform at peak efficiency.

The C50 and STAR8800 are engineered to meet the needs of caregivers and their patients. The intuitive design provides a high level of performance and reliability, supporting quality patient care.

name: Capacele dezinfectante Curos
enfullDescription:
Curos is a sealed polyethylene cap containing polyurethane foam moistened with a 70% concentration of  isopropyl alcohol (IPA). It is designed to be used together with needle-free connectors for vascular access.

Consistent use of Curos disinfecting caps on I.V. needleless connectors is associated with decreased CLABSI. Curos caps are alcohol-containing caps that twist onto ports for disinfection and protection. Each Curos cap contains 70% isopropyl alcohol (IPA) which bathes the surface of the port and disinfects it in 1 minute.

Curos disinfecting caps are dispensed as individual caps or on a convenient ten-cap strip which can be hung from I.V. poles for easy access. Strips have a hanger on both ends so the strip can be cut if necessary.

fullDescription: Curos - capacele dezinfectante pentru protejarea porturilor de acces vascular. Capacelele contin alcool izopropilic (IPA) in concentratie de 70%.  si dezinfecteaza suprafata portuluilor intr-un minut .Protejeaza punctele de acces intravenos  pana la 7 zile.   Gama larga de modele concepute pentru conectori fara ac,  porturi "femeie"  sau "barbat".

fullDescription:
Cateterele arteriale Arrow sunt disponibile intr-o gama larga pentru realizarea abordului arterial, radial sau femural, prin diferite tehnici Seldinger standard, integrat sau modificat (cateterele QuickFlash cu fereastra de vizualizare a refluxului de sange, ce combina usurinta abordului iv periferic cu avantajele tehnicii Seldinger). 
Indiferent de tipul tehnicii Seldinger prin care se insera, toate cateterele arteriale din gama Arrow confera avantajul unei monitorizari hemodinamice de incredere. 
Cateterele arteriale Seldinger sunt realizate din poliuretan sau poliamida, sunt prevazute cu invelis hidrofilic pentru facilitarea insertiei, sunt fara sau cu linie de extensie (pentru evitarea riscurilor de infectie datorate manevrelor repetate in imediata apropiere a locului de insertie). 
Disponibile in seturi ce contin toate elementele necesare insertiei: ac introducator, fir ghid si cateter intr-o gama larga de diametre si lungimi.

name: Sonda urinara BIP Foley din LATEX
enSmallDescription: Latex catheter with coating consists of the noble metals
enfullDescription:
The BIP Foley Catheter is a Bactiguard coated LATEX catheter. It is also coated with a hydrogel that facilitates the introduction and removal of the catheter. During use the hydrogel reduces friction and wear between the catheter material and the urethra.

BIP – Bactiguard Infection Protection 
The Bactiguard coating is extremely thin and permanently bound to the surface of the medical device. The coating consists of the noble metals gold, palladium and silver. It’s only a few millionths of a millimeter thin and remains on the product throughout its lifecycle. The unique mechanism of action reduces the adhesion of 
bacteria to a Bactiguard coated surface. This occurs without any pharmacological or toxic effect, and is an important component in the prevention of HAI and the reduction of antibiotic use. 

Catether available with 2 or 3 ways, in a range of sizes
smallDescription: Sonda Foley din latex cu strat din metal nobil
fullDescription:
Sonda urinara Foley antimicrobiana pentru prevenirea CAUTI din latex impregnat cu amestec de metale nobile (aur, argint, paladium) in strat subtire stabil legat de suprafata ce previne aderarea germenilor la sonda. Biocompatibile fara efecte farmacologice sau toxice fara dezvoltarea rezistentei antimicrobiene. 
Cu 2 sau 3 cai si disponibile in dimensiuni varaiate, pentru uz pediatric sau adult.
seoDescription: Monitorul pentru supravegherea functiilor vitale Spacelabs C50 este o solutie preconfigurata pentru monitorizarea langa pat a pacientului.

enfullDescription:
With their ARROW brand, Teleflex Medical covers the complete range of central venous catheters. Arrow CVCs are available in an unmatched variety of lumen configurations, lengths, French and Gauge sizes, with either standard catheters or catheters with ARROWg+ard antimicrobial technology.

smallDescription: Gama larga de catetere venoase centrale Arrow standard si antimicrobiene de uz pediatric si adult
fullDescription:
Gama larga de catetere venoase centrale Arrow standard si antimicrobiene de uz pediatric si adult cuprinde o mare varietate de configuratii si dimensiuni ale lumenelor (in French si Gauge), cu lungimi diverse pentru a acoperi necesitatile de acces venos pe termen scurt < 30 zile.
Teleflex Medical, prin gama de catetere venoase centrale cu tehnologia antimicrobiana ARROWg+ard, confera specialistilor un plus de siguranta si suport in prevenirea infectiilor si reducerea costurilor asociate acestora. Impregnarea antimicrobiana ARROWg+ard reprezinta recomandarea numarul 1 a CDC, eficienta ei fiind demonstrata prin numeroase studii clinice de specialitate.
Cateterele venoase centrale Arrow sunt realizate din poliuretan cu proprietatea de a deveni mai moale in situ, cu varf flexibil pentru insertie facila si atraumatica, cu jonctiune sudata, flexibila si cu profil redus. Sunt diponibile in seturi care includ toate componentele necesare unei insertii rapide si sigure: ac de punctie de tip Seldinger cu sau fara sistem de acces suplimentar de tip cateter peste ac, cu fir ghid spiralat in dispozitiv de introducere cu o singura mana, cu dilatator, cu seringa standard sau cu seringa antiembolism ce faciliteaza si insertia firului ghid fara a mai fi necesara detasarea de ac, cu sau fara cablu pentru pozitionarea simultana cu ajutorul ECG.

name: Catetere pentru hemodializa ARROW
enfullDescription: Arrow’s innovative dialysis access products are inspired by clinicians, based on the results they need to achieve - whether that’s precise tip placement or fast removal of thrombus. Therefore, we design every catheter to be as easy to use as it is effective, and precisely manufacture each one with uncompromising quality. As a result, clinicians trust Arrow’s technology to enable safer procedures and deliver effective patient outcomes.
smallDescription: Catetere pentru hemodializa Arrow (Teleflex), temporare sau pentru termen lung
fullDescription:
Cateterele pentru hemodializa Arrow de la Teleflex sunt de uz temporar sau pentru utilizare pe termen lung.
Cateterele de hemodializa Arrow pentru uz temporar sunt disponibile intr-o gama larga de dimensiuni (15-25cm / 12 sau 14F) si forme (drepte, drepte cu extensii curbate, precurbate), cu doua sau trei lumene, standard sau impregnate antimicrobian cu tehnologia ARROWg+ard (recomandarea numarul 1 a CDC, eficienta ei in prevenirea infectiilor asociate cateterizarii fiind demonstrata prin numeroase studii clinice de specialitate). Sunt realizate din poliuretan, cu varf flexibil pentru o insertie facila si atraumatica, cu aripioara rotativa de fixare fara suturare a jonctiunii si sunt concepute pentru livrarea unor fluxuri mari de sange la presiuni scazute.
Cateterele de hemodializa Arrow pentru termen lung sunt disponibile intr-o gama foarte variata, realizate din poliuretan, cu varf in trepte sau cu varf de tip Y, pentru tunelizare antegrada sau retrograda, cu diametre de 15F si cu diferite lungimi (de la 19cm pana la 55cm in functie de modelul cateterului) si sunt disponibile in seturi complete ce contin toate elementele necesare insertiei: ac introducator, fir ghid, dilatatoare, tunelizator, teaca detasabila prin exfoliere, cateterul cu linii de extensie prevazute cu cleme, fixatoare pentru cateter.
seoDescription: Cateterul pentru hemodializa Arrow Teleflex asigura proceduri sigure, cu rezultate mai bune si o recuperare eficienta a pacientului.

name: Cavilon film protector
enfullDescription:
Cavilon No Sting Barrier Film is a durable terpolymer-based alcohol-free barrier film, which forms a breathable, transparent protective coating on the skin to protect from friction, adhesive trauma and bodily fluids (such as urine and/or faeces and
wound exudate).

The gentler way to protect skin from body fluids, adhesives and friction. Alcohol-free barrier film applies without stinging. Forms a breathable, transparent film for long-lasting protection. It is fast drying and non-sticky for better patient comfort. Works even when applied over an area with bends or creases. Non-cytotoxic and hypoallergenic, Cavilon No Sting Barrier Film can be used on both intact and damaged skin. Provides clinically-proven protection against incontinence-associated dermatitis (IAD).

It does not sting, even on torn or irritated skin.
Cost-effective - provides protection for up to 72 hours.
Transparent - for easy skin monitoring.
Compatible with skin preparation solutions (namely, chlorhexidine gluconate and povidone iodine).

Available: Box with 25 bags of 1 ml each
smallDescription: Film protector neiritant
fullDescription:
Filmul protector neiritant Cavilon este o pelicula durabila fara alcool pe baza de terpolimer, care formeaza un strat transparent ce lasa pielea sa respire, protejand impotriva frecarii, traumatismelor provocate de adezivi si lichidelor corporale (precum urina si/sau materii fecale si exsudat din plaga).

Nu ustura, chiar si pe piele rupta sau iritata.
Nu incarca substratul absorbantelor pentru incontinenta.
Rentabil - asigura protectie pana la 72 de ore.
Transparent - pentru monitorizarea cu usurinta a pielii.
Compatibil cu solutii de pregatire a pielii (si anume, gluconat de clorhexidina si iod povidona).

Disponibil: Cutie cu 25 de plicuri a cate 1ml
seoDescription: Cea mai buna solutie pentru drenajul toracic este Pleur-evac Teleflex cu capacitati variabile de la 150ml pana la 2500ml si tehnologia eficienta de gestionare a fluidelor.

name: Cavilon crema
enfullDescription:
3M Cavilon Durable Barrier Cream provides unique, long-lasting protection from bodily fluids whilst moisturising the skin.

Formulated with 3M polymer technology, 3M Cavilon Durable Barrier Cream is a concentrated, fragrance-free moisturizing skin barrier that resists wash-off and allows adhesives to adhere. It’s ideal for moisturization of at-risk and/or severely dry skin. It also provides a barrier which protects skin at low risk for breaking down.

Moisturizes as it protects skin against incontinence-associated dermatitis (IAD).
Provides a breathable barrier to promote skin health.
Resists wash-off, eliminating the need for frequent reapplication.

Available in a 92g tube.
smallDescription: Crema pentru protectie indelungata
fullDescription:
Cavilon Durable Barrier Cream este o crema hidratanta tip bariera unica alcatuita din polimeri 3M utilizata pentru pacientii cu risc de dermatita asociata incontinentei (IAD). Crema concentrata, fara parfum, necesita aplicari mai putin frecvente si este rezista la spalare. Formula hipoalergenica contine Dimeticona pentru a proteja mai bine pielea pacientilor. Compatibil cu gluconatul de clorhexidina (CHG).

Cavilon Durable Barrier Cream ofera o protectie unica si de durata fata de fluidele corporale, hidratand pielea. Este destinata utilizarii pe pielea sanatoasa sau usor iritata ca bariera primara de protectie impotriva macerarii sau iritatiilor provocate de urina si/ sau materii fecale. Formula sa foarte concentrata, permite utilizarea unei cantitati foarte mici pentru suprafete intinse de piele.

Produs concentrat - necesita o aplicare mai putin frecventa si mai putin produs cu fiecare aplicare decat barierele tipice de protectie.
Dovedit ca reduce dermatita asociata incontinentei si ca reduce incidenta leziunilor prin rupere ale pielii atunci cand este utilizata ca parte a unui protocol de ingrijire a zonei sacrale.

Este disponibila in tub 92 g.

name: Celerity 20 HP
enSmallDescription: Biological indicator for V-Pro and Sterrad
enfullDescription: Celerity 20 HP Biological Indicators are single-use biological indicators designed to monitor both V-PRO Low Temperature Sterilization Systems and Sterrad Models, providing a final read within 20 minutes of incubation. Each indicator is self-contained, inoculated with Geobacillus stearothermophilus bacterial spores and contains a defined media within the vial cap. The vial cap label includes a process indicator for hydrogen peroxide.
smallDescription: Indicator biologic pentru V-Pro si Sterrad
fullDescription: Indicatorul biologic Celerity 20 HP este un indicator biologic de unica folosinta conceput pentru a monitoriza atat sistemele de sterilizare la temperatura joasa V-PRO, cat si modelele Sterrad, oferind o citire finala in 20 de minute de la incubare. Fiecare indicator este autonom, inoculat cu spori bacterieni Geobacillus stearothermophilus si contine un mediu definit in capacul flaconului. Eticheta de pe capacul flaconului include un indicator de proces pentru peroxid de hidrogen.
seoDescription: Teaca introductoare percutanata Super Arrow Flex de la Teleflex asigura acces vascular flexibil pentru a acoperi mai multe aplicatii vasculare.

name: Celerity 20 Steam
enfullDescription:
The Celerity 20 STEAM Biological Indicator (BI) is used for monitoring, qualification or product testing of 121°C (250°F) to 135°C (275°F) dynamic-air-removal steam sterilization cycles.
When used in conjunction with the Celerity STEAM Incubator, the Incubator provides a fluorescent result within 20 minutes.

Features
20-minute incubation time for fast results and quick device turnaround
Barcode on process indicator label makes electronic documentation of lot numbers and expiration dates easy
BI has a Twist & Flick activation, reducing the potential of contamination from "over activated" vials and eliminating need of a second activator
Glass-free BI design reduces potential for injury from broken glass
Blue cap and labeling allows for easy identification of sterilization process
smallDescription: Indicator biologic pentru sterilizarea la abur
fullDescription:
Indicatorul biologic Celerity 20 pentru abur este utilizat pentru monitorizarea, clasificarea sau testarea de produs la 121°C (250°F) pana la 135°C (275°F) la extragerea dinamica la ciclurile de sterilizare cu abur.
Indicatorul biologic se activeaza prin Twist & Flick (Invarte si Apasa), iar timpul de incubare este de doar 20 de minute.

The Hem-o-lok Clip’s non-absorbable polymer composition and flexible hinge allow it to pass through a smaller port and provide a larger distal opening than comparable metal clips. As a result, Hem-o-lok Clips can ligate up to a 10 mm structure through a 5 mm port, and up to a 16 mm structure through a 10 mm port.

Cu ajutorul acestor clipuri pot fi ligaturate structuri de la 2 pana la 16 mm. Prevazute cu cod de culoare corespunzator dimensiunii (acelasi cod la clipuri si la aplicatoare). The Dart test is easy to use. It's a lightweight, compact, one-piece system ready for use. You will never again have to spend time looking for towels and preparing packs. By using the Dart test, you can eliminate all the waste associated with "paper box" products. No more shuffling through packs looking for the test results.

The unique compact barrel design creates a barrier to air removal and steam penetration. The Daily Air Removal Test is placed directly into an otherwise empty steam sterilizer chamber and does not require a retaining device.

name: PercuTwist One-Step
enfullDescription:
The Rüsch PercuTwist One-Step Dilator from Teleflex is a patented single-step dilator that has made percutaneous tracheostomy a controllable and genuinely safe procedure and has thus set new standards.

It comes with an application which is surprisingly simple and gentle. Enhanced cosmetic results are often achieved in comparison with a surgical procedure, as the access site requires an incision of less than 2 cm. Its innovative design with a dilating thread makes it possible to lift the tracheal anterior wall while simultaneously dilating through simple rotation. The hydrophilic coating reduces friction and allows smoother access into the trachea.
Available in a choice of 3 sizes to enable the device to be used most effectively for a wide range of adult patients.

An unrestricted endoscopic view of the dilation site is guaranteed at any given time.
smallDescription: Trusa de traheostomie percutanata PercuTwist Rüsch Teleflex
fullDescription:
PercuTwist Rüsch de la Teleflex este un dilator de “unic pas” ce realizeaza dilatarea necesara in procedurile de traheostomie percutanata printr-o tehnica controlabila prin rotire.
Traheostomia ce se realizeaza cu ajutorul truselor PercuTwist este foarte simpla si atraumatica, cu rezultate cosmetice deosebite, incizia necesara fiind mai mica de 2 cm. Conceptul inovator ala aecstui tip de dilatator face posibila ridicarea peretelui traheal anterior cu dilatarea simultana prin rotire. Invelisul hidrofilic reduce frictiunea si ofera acces lin in trahee.
In acelasi timp este asigurata o vizibilitate endoscopica nerestrictionata in interiorul traheei a dilatarii, fara intreruperea fluxului de aer.
Trusa de traheostomie PercuTwist este disponibila in diferite dimensiuni pentru adulti si contine toate elementele necesare montarii.

name: Frequencer
enSmallDescription: The power of acoustics to provide effective, yet gentle, airway clearance therapy
enfullDescription: The Frequencer device provides patients with gentle, yet effective, airway clearance therapy, to help mobilize lung secretions and promote treatment adherence for patients with lung disorders including bronchiectasis, cystic fibrosis, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease and neuromuscular diseases. Our unique patented technology delivers a new modality in health physics, by using acoustic sound waves to act on both the lungs and the mucus. The Frequencer® generates sound waves within the range of 20-65Hz and offers an adjustable intensity based on the patient’s condition. Sound used at these frequencies offer a completely new range of specific and targeted treatment possibilities in airway clearance.
smallDescription: Terapie eficienta
fullDescription: Frequencer ofera o terapie de curatare a cailor respiratorii si ajuta la drenarea bronsica prin vibratii trimise prin peretii toracelui. name: EZ-Blocker
enSmallDescription: Minimally invasive, next generation bronchus blocker
enfullDescription:
The EZ-Blocker Endobronchial Blocker from Teleflex was developed by an anaesthetist for use by anaesthetists to provide an improved device for lung isolation. The EZ-Blocker Endobronchial Blocker has a Y-shaped distal end that mirrors the bifurcation of the trachea. 
The bifurcated distal end of the EZ-Blocker Endobronchial Blocker allows for the intuitive placement of the cuffs in the right or left bronchus. Once the EZ-Blocker Endobronchial Blocker is advanced through the distal end of a single-lumen endotracheal tube, the bifurcated cuffs separate and are naturally directed into the left and right main stem bronchi.
The EZ-Blocker Endobronchial Blocker is securely placed at the carina without the need for navigation of the cuff into either of the bronchi.
With the EZ-Blocker Endobronchial Blocker, cuff inflation can be performed just before lung isolation, which minimises the need to manipulate the catheter after placement and reduces the potential for the cuffs to become dislodged.

EZ-Blocker Set - Y-shaped endobronchial blocker for lung isolation and one-lung ventilation
Bronchopart tube set - clear double-lumen bronchial tube
Sher-I-Bronch endobronchial tube - left-sided double lumen endobronchial tube for intubation of left mainstem bronchus, right-sided double lumen endobronchial tube for intubation of right mainstem bronchus and clear double-lumen bronchial tube with soft Carina hook

name: HAMILTON-C1
enfullDescription:
The HAMILTON-C1 is the ideal companion for all patient groups, including neonates. It adapts effortlessly to a variety of different settings, such as the intensive care unit, emergency ward, recovery room or intermediate care, as well as long-term acute care facilities and during intrahospital transport.
The integrated high-performance turbine enables the HAMILTON-C1 to be completely independent
of compressed air. In addition, it provides a peak flow of up to 260 l/min, and guarantees optimal
performance for noninvasive ventilation.
The HAMILTON-C1 includes Hamilton Medical‘s standardized Ventilation Cockpit user interface and the
unique intelligent ventilation mode, Adaptive Support Ventilation (ASV).
smallDescription: Dimensiunea minima - performanta maxima
fullDescription: Hamilton-C1 este unic in oferirea performantei unui ventilator destinat terapiei intensive intr-un design compact. Ofera flexibilitate maxima in medii de utilizare diverse, fie ca este vorba de ingrijire pe termen lung, terapie intensiva, urgenta, sau ingrijire respiratorie. Suficient de mic pentru a se potrivi in aproape orice mediu de terapie intensiva si la preturi competitive, Hamilton-C1 acopera intreaga gama de cerinte clinice: ventilatie invaziva, ventilatie adaptiva (ASV), si ventilatie non-invaziva (NIV).

name: HAMILTON-C3
enfullDescription:
The HAMILTON-C3 includes Hamilton Medical's standardized Ventilation Cockpit user interface and the unique intelligent ventilation mode, Adaptive Support Ventilation (ASV). The HAMILTON-C3S edition includes the optional INTELLiVENT-ASV mode. This unique mode takes the proven concepts of ASV one step further: INTELLiVENT-ASV automatically controls the patient's ventilation and oxygenation based on targets set by the clinician and on physiologic input from the patient. 

The HAMILTON-C3 includes the optional Protective Ventilation Tool (P/V Tool Pro) to assess recruitability. The P/V Tool Pro also provides an easy and repeatable method for performing recruitment maneuvers.
The HAMILTON-C3 optionally provides an integrated high flow oxygen therapy mode with a flow of up to 80 l/min.
smallDescription: Ventilatorul compact de inalta performanta
fullDescription:
HAMILTON-C3 include interfata de utilizator Ventilation Cockpit de la Hamilton Medical si modul unic de ventilatie inteligenta, Adaptive Support Ventilation (ASV). Editia HAMILTON-C3S include modul optional INTELLIVENT-ASV. Acest mod unic duce conceptele dovedite ale ASV cu un pas mai departe: INTELLIVENT-ASV controleaza automat ventilatia si oxigenarea pacientului pe baza obiectivelor stabilite de medic si a aporului fiziologic al pacientului.
HAMILTON-C3 include optional Protective Ventilation Tool (P/V tool Pro) pentru evaluarea in vederea recrutarii alveolare. P/V Tool Pro ofera, de asemenea, o metoda usoara si eficienta pentru efectuarea manevrelor de recrutare.
HAMILTON-C3 ofera in mod optional un mod de terapie cu oxigen cu flux mare, cu un debit de 80 l/min.

name: HAMILTON-C6
enSmallDescription: The next generation of intelligent ICU ventilators
enfullDescription:
The HAMILTON-C6 represents a new generation of high-end ventilators. The combination of modularity, ease of use, mobility, and advanced features allows you to individualize your patient's ventilation therapy.
The HAMILTON-C6 adapts to your individual user environment. Mount it on a trolley, with the 
interaction panel on top or in front, or use the shelf-mounted version with the interaction panel on 
the side or mounted on the pendant system.
smallDescription: Generatia noua de ventilatoare performante
fullDescription:
HAMILTON-C6 reprezinta a noua generatie de ventilatoare performante. Combinarea modularitatii, usurintei in utilizare, mobilitatii si caracteristicilor avansate va permite sa individualizati terapia ventilatorie a pacientilor.
HAMILTON-C6 se adapteaza mediului individual de utilizator. Se monteaza pe un cart, cu panoul de interactiune superior sau frontal, se utilizeaza versiunea de montare pe etajera cu panoul de interactiune lateral sau se monteaza pe un stativ.
Panoul de ventilatie la HAMILTON-C6 consolideaza datele de monitorizare si le afiseaza in grafice intuitive. Ele ofera o imagine rapida a statusului ventilator current al pacientului si furnizeaza baze solide pentru deciziile terapeutice.

name: HAMILTON-MR1
enSmallDescription: Intelligent Ventilation from ICU to MRI - Especially developed for the MRI suite
enfullDescription:
The HAMILTON-MR1 combines reliability, compact size, and high performance with patient-adaptive modes that support advanced lung-protective strategies. It is the ideal choice for transporting ventilated patients to the MRI department. 
The HAMILTON-MR1 guarantees continuous, uncompromised ventilation care from the ICU to the MRI scanner and back.
Hamilton Medical offers a variety of breathing circuits suitable for the MRI suite. The proximal flow sensor allows you to measure flow and pressure close to the patient’s airway, even when using very long breathing circuits
smallDescription: Ventilatorul inteligent pentru ATI si RMN
fullDescription:
HAMILTON-MR1 combina fiabilitatea si dimensiuni compacte cu performanta ridicata de adaptare la pacient care asigura strategiile de protectie pulmonara. Este solutia ideala pentru a transporta pacientii ventilati in departamentul RMN.
HAMILTON-MR1  garanteaza o ingrijire continua si fara compromisuri din punct de vedere respirator de la ATI la RMN si inapoi. Frana de blocare automata a cartului blocheaza rotile imediat ce eliberati manerul pentru a preveni deplasarea accidentala catre RMN.

name: HAMILTON-T1
enSmallDescription: Designed for mobility and convenient transport
enfullDescription:
The first transport ventilator that combines the functionality of a fully featured ICU ventilator with the compactness and ruggedness required for transport.     
The HAMILTON-T1 meets the transport standards EN 794-3 and ISO 10651-3 for emergency and transport ventilators, EN 1789 for ambulances, EN 13718-1 and RTCA/DO-160G for aircraft, as well as IEC 60601-1-12 for basic safety and essential performance. It reliably accompanies your patients to any destination either within or outside of the hospital, on the ground, at sea, and in the air.
smallDescription: Mobilitate nelimitata - Certificat pentru toate tipurile de transport
fullDescription:
Unul din cele mai bune ventilatoare din clasa sa, HAMILTON-T1 asigura ventilatia optima pe durata transportului pacientilor din toate grupele, de la adulti la nou-nascuti. 
HAMILTON-T1 intruneste toate standardele de transport precum EN 794-3 si ISO 10651-3 pentru ventilatoare de urgenta si transport, EN 1789 pentru ambulante EN 13718-1 precum si RTCA/DO-160G pentru aeronave Acompaniaza pacientii intr-un mod sigur in sau in afara spitalului, pe sol, pe mare sau in aer.

name: Hemosep
enfullDescription:
Hemosep is different to traditional cell salvage because all blood components are saved, not just red blood cells (RBC).
Hemosep is simple and reproducible way to provide patients with a haemoconcentrated mix of all cell components, including platelets and clotting factors, which are lost in traditional cell salvage techniques.

Hemosep processes the patient’s salvaged blood collected during medium to high blood loss procedures including cardiac, orthopaedic, spinal, renal and vascular surgeries. It uses modified separation technique, concentrating the blood through a membrane controlled superabsorber.
Hemosep can be used to collect and process both residual surgical site blood and blood from the heart-lung machine post bypass. To collect the blood left in the heart-lung machine, the Hemosep Cell Concentrator Bag can simply be connected to the tubing below the reservoir for gravity fill.
smallDescription: Cell-Saver Hemosep
fullDescription: Echipament de hemoconcentrare a sangelui prin proces de agitare si filtrare in urma caruia se obtine un compus pentru autotransfuzie ce contine toate elementele principale ale sangelui (hemoglobina, plachete, factori de coagulare). Produsul rezidual poate fi eliminat in siguranta fiind sub forma gelatinoasa.

name: Solutie de perioxid de hidrogen HPV-AQ Bioquell
enfullDescription:
Bioquell HPV-AQ is a high quality, high purity aqueous hydrogen peroxide solution designed for use with Bioquell technology. The peroxide has only one active ingredient and meets regulatory standards around the world. For enhanced safety and traceability, when used with specific Bioquell bottles, the peroxide can be tracked through the use of RFID tags, ensuring only approved peroxide is used.

The 35% aqueous hydrogen peroxide solution from Bioquell, also known as Bioquell HPV-AQ is designed for use with Bioquell advanced hydrogen peroxide vapour technology. The solution when combined with the technology has been researched, tested and evaluated to ensure consistent efficacious cycles, by delivering a 6-log sporicidal reduction verified using standard biological indicators. 

Available in a range of different bottle sizes
smallDescription: Solutie apoasa de peroxid de hidrogen 35%
fullDescription: Bioquell HPV-AQ este o solutie apoasa de peroxid de hidrogen de inalta calitate, de inalta puritate, conceputa pentru a fi utilizata cu tehnologia Bioquell, asigurad o reducere de 6 log a gradului de contaminare cu bacterii si virusi. Peroxidul are un singur ingredient activ si indeplineste standardele de reglementare din intreaga lume. Pentru o siguranta si o trasabilitate sporita, atunci cand este utilizat cu sticlutele specifice Bioquell, peroxidul poate fi urmarit prin utilizarea etichetelor RFID, asigurandu-se astfel utilizarea doar a perioxidului aprobat.

name: Incubator cu abur Celerity
enfullDescription:
The Celerity Steam Incubator is designed to incubate and automatically read the Celerity 20 Steam Biological Indicator (BI) at 57°C (135°F) for a fluorescent result within 20 minutes.
The Celerity Steam Incubator is a compact, eight-well tabletop incubator with a setpoint of 57°C (135°F) and acceptable tolerances of -2°/+3°C. The device serves as both an incubator and a fluorescence detector. 

The unit consists primarily of two independent, heating blocks, each containing four numbered wells machined to match the shape of the Celerity 20 Steam BI. While the activated BI is incubating, viability is determined by an increase in fluorescent signal from the enzymatic breakdown of a fluorogenic substrate present in the media.

Incubator Dimensions: 290 x 95 x160 mm
smallDescription: Incubator compact
fullDescription:
Celerity Steam este un incubator compact, cu opt godeuri si suport pentru masa, cu valoarea de referinta a temperaturii de 57°C (135°F) si toleranta acceptata de -2°/ +3°C. Dispozitivul serveste, atat precum incubator, cat si ca un detector fluorescent.
Incubatorul Celerity Steam este conceput sa incubeze si sa citeasca automat indicatorul biologic Celerity 20 Steam la 57°C (135°F) pentru un rezultat rapid, in mai putin de 20 de minute.

Unique design — black aluminum handle and gold-plated blades allow the set to be easily distinguishable

fullDescription: Destinate intubarii in mediul RMN, laringoscoapele Tru-MR sunt testate si certificate pentru utilizare in mediu cu un camp magnetic static de pana la 3 Tesla si cu gradient al campului de pana la 720 Gauss/cm. name: Laringoscoape
enSmallDescription: Bright light when you need it most
enfullDescription:
Rüsch conventional single-use laryngoscope blades and Rüsch Fibre-Optic single-use handles incorporate a bright blue-white, integrated LED light source, which provides uniform light to minimise shadowing and aid tissue differentiation. Laryngoscopes with LED light sources frequently 
outperform laryngoscopes with incandescent bulbs, with up to a 2.5 times greater mean illuminance.
Rüsch Fibre-Optic single-use laryngoscope blades deliver focused fibre-optic light transmission to minimise light scatter and aid visualisation.

Rüsch Single-Use Laryngoscopes offer the weight and feel of a reusable blade with the convenience of a single-use blade. Rüsch standard single-use blades also eliminate the hassles of reusable blades, including the time and cost of reprocessing, without sacrificing strength or light quality.

No matter what the need or patient scenario, our full range of airway management solutions are designed to make intubation safe and efficient. Rüsch Reusable Laryngoscopes are available in both standard and fiber optic and have a full range of sizes and styles to choose from.
smallDescription: Laringoscoape Rüsch - lumina intensa la nevoie
fullDescription: Gama de laringoscoape Rüsch de la Teleflex este extrem de variata, cuprinzand sisteme de unica folosinta si reutilizabile, atat lame, cat si manere, de la sistemele conventionale cu sursa de lumina localizata la nivelul lamei, pana la cele cu fibra optica cu sursa de lumina situata la nivelul manerului si avand o durata de viata lunga, cu iluminare de tip Xenon sau cu tehnologie LED. Unele lame reutilizabile sunt prevazute cu fibra optica inlocuibila pentru reducerea costurilor.
seoDescription: Mesa vascoasa cu miere medicinala creeaza un mediu umed care favorizeaza vindecarea si cu rol antibacterian.

name: Legflow OTW si RX
enfullDescription:
The Legflow balloon drug coating quality is a major step beyond contemporary first and second generation DCB coatings. Legflow RX/OTW provides a 100% anti-proliferative vessel wall protection, and promotes rapid healing after mechanical balloon angioplasty.

Treating peripheral artery disease (PAD) in the superficial femoral artery (SFA) is a difficult challenge. The anatomy is very dynamic and contains complex lesions, but also patient comorbidities such as diabetes require the clinically most-effective therapy. The new Legflow Paclitaxel-releasing peripheral balloon dilatation catheter provides a clinically most successful treatment of peripheral artery disease, and ensures a long-term vessel patency.

The rate of recurrent stenosis after PTA and stenting is higher in the below-the-knee area than in femoropopliteal procedures. The absence of metal struts makes the Legflow balloon dilatation suitable for treating long lesions, especially in small diameter vessels and areas in which flexion and compression of the stent may occur and result in stent fractures, particularly in the below-the-knee area. Thanks to the new stable ‘SAFEPAX’ PTX coating technology, the treatment of critical limb ischemia patients appears as safe as POBA angioplasty.

Legflow OTW	
Shaft material: Polyamide
Balloon material: Polyamide
Usable catheter length: 150 cm
Max. recommended guide wire: 0.014“
Introducer sheat size: 4F	
Paclitaxel coating: 3.0 μg/mm²

Legflow RX
Shaft material: Steinless steel
Balloon material: Polyamide
Usable catheter length: 140 cm
Max. recommended guide wire: 0.014“
Introducer sheat size: 5F ø 2.0 - 3.5 mm, 5F ø 4.0 mm
Paclitaxel coating: 3.0 μg/mm²
smallDescription: Balon acoperit cu medicament Safepax PTX
fullDescription: Legflow RX/OTW ofera o protectie 100% anti-proliferativa a peretilor vaselor si promoveaza vindecarea rapida dupa angioplastia cu balon.

name: Masti anestezie si ventilatie
enSmallDescription: Comfortable to wear, excellent fit, reliable performance
enfullDescription:
Whether they are made of PVC, silicone, Wirupren Material or rubber latex, the wide selection of our Rüsch and Hudson RCI anaesthesia masks at your disposal meets every requirement. They all offer a reliable and safe application in approved quality, are highly comfortable for the user to wear, and are classic examples of our long tradition of serving the medical market with tried and tested quality products.

Disposable face masks with air cushion 
Clear comfort mask
Head harness for face masks
Silicone reusable face masks 
Paediatric Silicone face mask
Paediatric black Rubber face mask

Available in a range of sizes
smallDescription: Confortabile pentru purtare, potrivire perfecta, performante de incredere
fullDescription: Fabricate din PVC, silicon, Wirupren sau cauciuc (latex), gama larga de masti pentru anestezie si ventilatie Rüsch si Hudson RCI confera aplicare de incredere si sigura pentru toate necesitatile clinice. Calitative si confortabile, sunt exemple clasice ale traditiei indelungate de sadisfacere a pietei medicale cu produse de calitate incercate si testate. Cu manson gonflabil sau preumflat (fara valva), cu sau fara inel de fixare, de unica utilizare sau reutilizabile, pentru uz adult, pediatric sau neo-natal, mastile pentru anestezie/ventilatie sunt disponibile intr-o gama mare de dimensiuni. Accesoriu disponibil: ham pentru fixarea mastilor fabricat din cauciuc.
seoDescription: Pansament steril din spuma moale de silicon, antimicrobian, care absorba exsudatul din rana.

name: Masti laringiene
enSmallDescription: Elevating safety and comfort in anaesthesia and emergency medicine
enfullDescription:
The true benefits of laryngeal masks are: they are less invasive than endotracheal tubes, and they can be easily inserted. As such, laryngeal masks are used for airway management in both anaesthesia and emergency medicine. Teleflex offers a wide range of laryngeal masks, meeting most patient and clinical needs. This includes the LMA Airways portfolio with the LMA Supreme Second Generation Gastric Access Airway and the LMA Unique Laryngeal Mask Airway featuring integrated Cuff Pilot Technology.

Available in a range of sizes.
smallDescription: Masti laringiene de generatia I, II pentru confort si siguranta in ATI si medicina de urgenta
fullDescription: Masti laringiene pentru confort si siguranta in medicina de urgenta mai putin invazive decat sondele endotraheale si cu insertie mai facila. Masti de generatia I si II (cu acces gastric separat, cu posibilitate de intubare prin masca). Simple sau ramforsate cu armatura metalica, cu tub din PVC sau fabricate complet din silicon cu si fara tehnologie de monitorizare constanta a presiunii din manson. Masti laringiene de generatia II: Suprim, Protector si mastile laringiene Fastrach.
seoDescription: Algivon Advancis este un pansament din fibre intarite de alginat cu miere de Manuka pentru curatarea ranilor adanci cu tesut necrotic.

name: medinCNO
enSmallDescription: HFNC-mode and nCPAP in one device
enfullDescription: medinCNO is a versatile nCPAP device which is used to provide respiratory support to premature infants and newborns. In combination with Medijet, the compact device is a stand-alone system and meets all requirements for non-invasive nCPAP therapy.  With five modes (CPAP, ApneaCPAP, NIPPV, SNIPPV, Oscillation), medinCNO offers comprehensive non-invasive support in neonatology and is the only nCPAP device with nHFV.
smallDescription: HFNC si nCPAP intr-un singur dispozitiv
fullDescription:
medinCNO este un dispozitiv versatil nCPAP care este utilizat pentru a oferi suport respirator pentru bebelusi prematuri si nou-nascutiilor. In combinatie cu Medijet, dispozitivul compact este un sistem autonom si indeplineste toate cerintele pentru terapia nCPAP.
Cu cinci moduri (CPAP, ApneaCPAP, NIPPV, SNIPPV, oscilatie),  medinCNO ofera suport complet in neonatalogie si este singurul dispozitiv nCPAP cu nHFV.
seoDescription: Pansament cu miere medicinala pentru tratarea ranilor chirurgicale, cavitati si tesutului necrotic.

name: medinCNO mini
enfullDescription:
medinCNO mini offers the basic nCPAP and high-flow functions of a modern CPAP device.
In addition, the device has a special ApneaCPAP mode. With the aid of the MediTRIG respiratory trigger, the spontaneous breathing is detected near the patient and without any additional sensors. MediTRIG can be individually adapted to the patient’s spontaneous breathing. In the event of apnea, the patient’s inspiration is stimulated through automatically activated mechanical breaths.
smallDescription: Toate modurile de baza pentru suportul respirator NIV
fullDescription:
medinCNO mini ofera functiile de baza nCPAP si de debit inalt ale unui dispozitiv modern CPAP.
In plus, dispozitivul are un modul special ApneaCPAP. Cu ajutorul declansatorului respirator MediTRIG, respiratia spontana este detectata in aproprierea pacientului si fara senzori suplimentari.
MediTRIG poate fi adaptat individual la respiratia spontana a pacientului. In caz de apnee, inspiratia pacientului este stimulata prin respiratii mecanice activate automat.
seoDescription: Mesa tesuta impregnata cu miere pentru curatarea si vindecarea ranilor superficiale.

name: medin-NC3
enSmallDescription: The new generation of non-invasive respiratory support
enfullDescription:
medin-NC3 is the first turbine-driven CPAP device for non-invasive respiratory support for premature infants and newborns. The high-performance turbine makes the device independent of a fixed compressed air supply.
The proven MediTRIG technology is used in the ApneaCPAP mode. Powerful leakage compensation offsets leakages to ensure stable and effective therapy.  
The device offers all basic modes for modern non-invasive respiratory support.
smallDescription: Noua generatie de suport respirator neinvaziv
fullDescription:
medin-NC3 este primul dispozitiv CPAP cu turbina destinat suportului respirator neinvaziv pentru bebelusi prematuri si nou-nascuti. Turbina de inalta performanta face dispozitivul independent de o sursa fixa de aer comprimat.
Tehnologia dovedita MediTRIG este utilizata in modul ApneaCPAP. Compensarea puternica a pierderilor ajuta pentru asigurarea unei terapii stabile si eficiente.
seoDescription: Pansament din film transparent din poliuretan Vellafilm cu pad din silicon care are rol antibacterian. Se poate utiliza precum prim strat pe rani.

name: Medipore H
enfullDescription:
3M Medipore H Soft Cloth Surgical Tape is offering multi-directional stretch to accommodate swelling, distention and movement, and helps minimize the risk for skin injury.

Suggested applications: securing over areas where skin may stretch (e.g., edema, distention, hematoma formation or movement), securing dressings and drainage tubes, when swelling or movement anticipated, when repeated taping is needed

Ideal for patients who need to maintain movement or are experiencing swelling or distention.

Available in a range of sizes and shapes
smallDescription: Banda flexibila
fullDescription:
Banda chirurgicala din poliester netesut moale 3M Medipore H ofera intindere multidirectionala pentru a se adapta umflaturilor, distensiei si miscarii repetate si ajuta la minimizarea riscului de ranire a pielii.

Sugestii de aplicare: protejarea zonelor in care pielea se poate intinde (de exemplu, edem, distensie, formarea sau mișcarea hematoamei), fixarea pansamentelor spost-chirugicale abdominale, ortopedice, toracice si cardiotoracice.

Ideal pentru pacientii care au nevoie sa isi mentina miscarea sau care se confrunta cu umflaturi sau distensie.

Lungime disponibila:  9.14 m
Toate latimile disponibile:  2.50cm, 5 cm , 7.5 cm, 10 cm, 15 cm, 20 cm
seoDescription: Banda adeziva pe suport de matase 3M Durapore pentru fixarea  bandajelor, pansamentelor, cateterelor si canulelor.

name: MemoBag
enfullDescription:
The MemoBag device is a self-opening specimen bag. It is delivered sterile. it is single-use and disposable. 
MemoBag is designed for introduction through a standard 10-mm trocar. Immediately after introduction of the preloaded bag through the trocar, a nitinol wire, which is interlaced through the opening of the bag, opens the bag (due to its memory effect) inside the at the patient’s body. The introducer sheath with the pushing cannula is then removed, leaving the lumen of the trocar free for other instruments.
Tissue is put into the bag. When the procedure is finished, the bag is simply closed by pulling a wire loop and removed with the contents through an incision from the patient’s body.

Memobag consists of several components:
Introducer Sheath with a preloaded Extraction Bag
Pushing Cannula
Nitinol wire assembly 

Available in volume of 200 ml, 800 ml and 1200 ml
smallDescription: Dispozitiv extractie specimen laparoscopic MemoBag
fullDescription: Dispozitiv de extractie specimen laparoscopic MemoBag cu fir de nitinol cu memoria formei ce permite deschiderea automata a pungii in momentul eliberari din teaca introducatoare. Disponibil in 3 dimensiuni (200 ml, 800 ml, 1200 ml), oricare dintre acestea putand fi introdusa printr-un trocar standard de 10 mm.
seoDescription: Banda adeziva din film poros polietilena perforata, pentru a se rupe repede, cu rol de fixare tuburi, catetere, pansamente.

name: MicroClave Clear
enSmallDescription: Reduce the risk of bloodstream infection
enfullDescription:
MicroClave Clear is a needle-free, mechanically and microbiologically sealed connector with very short priming time and neutral pressure. The device automatically self-seals when not in use to prevent blood or fluid loss. The device is compatible with blood and blood related substances, biological fluids and lipids, and the usual chemotherapy/antiblastic drugs and thinners.

The MicroClave connector is a needle-free external valve with neutral pressure, bidirectional self-sealing and small unusable volume. The MicroClave connector can be used for infusions and/or harvesting blood and for long-term access to veins or arteries. The gasket opens automatically when it is penetrated by a Luer connector.

This device, compared to conventional needleless connectors, ensures both the elimination of the risk of needle injury, protecting operators from possible infection (with AIDS, hepatitis, etc.), and preventing the access of microorganisms into the system, minimizing microbial contamination. The MicroClave connection system, if used according to the established procedure, can be easily disinfected due to its flat surface. The MicroClave connector provides a sterile barrier for 7 days and 600 activations.

fullDescription:
Conectorii pentru accesarea fara ac a liniilor vasculare MicroClave Clear reduc riscul infectiilor sanguine actionand ca o bariera de protectie antimicrobiana si reduc riscul de trombozare a cateterelor datorita tehnologiei "fara dislocuire" (conector neutru). Suprafata lor neteda permite dezinfectarea rapida si eficienta inainte de accesare, iar calea dreapta pentru fluid din interiorul lor permite curatarea fara reziduuri.
Compatibilitatea cu sangele, lipidele, medicamentele chimioterapice, alcoolul, clorhexidina, injectarile cu presiune si compatibilitatea RMN ofera acestor conectori numeroase indicatii de utilizare, intr-o perioada de pana la 7 zile.

fullDescription:

name: Optimus AC3
enfullDescription:
The AC3 Optimus Intra-Aortic Balloon Pump is up and running with the push of a button. Set up is fast and easy, guided by visual prompts on the large high-definition touchscreen - including confirmation that therapy can be initiated. In AutoPilot Mode, the AC3 Optimus IABP automatically adjusts timing and triggering parameters, freeing clinicians to focus on the patient rather than the pump. A simple touch of the waveform provides access to controls, including the option to adjust volume. 

With a highly-advanced software platform and proprietary suite of algorithms, the AC3 Optimus Intra-Aortic Balloon Pump delivers outstanding haemodynamic support across a wide range of patient conditions. A user-friendly design, intuitive interface, and state-of-the-art AutoPilot Mode makes it incredibly simple to use. With this powerful combination, Teleflex has elevated counterpulsation therapy while making it more accessible than ever. 

Patient conditions can be ever-changing - maintaining optimal therapy requires continuous monitoring and adjustment. The third-generation AutoPilot Mode of the AC3 Optimus IABP makes it easy to track, sense, and adapt to changing conditions without any clinician intervention.
Our exclusive Best Signal Analysis identifies the best signal for triggering and timing and implements adjustments with speed and precision beyond that of a manual operator. AutoPilot Mode is automatically activated when therapy is initiated, providing full support from the first beat. It begins with full-assist and full volume at startup, and immediately begins monitoring and managing signals.

fullDescription: Cu o platforma software extrem de avansata si o suita proprie de algoritmi, pompa cu balon intraaortic AC3 Optimus ofera suport hemodinamic exceptional intr-o gama larga de afectiuni ale pacientului. Un design usor de utilizat, o interfata intuitiva si un mod auto-pilot de ultima generatie o fac incredibil de simplu de utilizat. Cu aceasta combinatie imbatabila, Teleflex a modernizat terapia de contrapulsare, facand-o mai accesibila ca niciodata.

name: Pungi pentru instrumentele robotice
enfullDescription:
Steriking Pouches meet the requirements of hospital steam sterilization procedures. Products are compatible with the ISO 11607, part 1 and 2 as well as with part 5 of the EN 868 demonstrating that the packaging for terminally sterilized medical devices meet the international and EU requirements. The scopes of these standards apply to healthcare facilities and wherever medical devices are packaged and sterilized.

The sizes of the packages has been designed to accommodate the da Vinci S/Si and X/Xi and SP Instruments. Pouches can also be used for packing some other long instruments requiring extra protection. 

The da Vinci S/Si and X/Xi and SP Instruments should be oriented housing to the opening end, to ensure aseptic presentation - easy removal of the packaging.
Where double packaging is required, it is important to position porous material against porous material and laminate against laminate because penetration of air and steam is only possible through the paper side. The inner packaging must not be folded so that the passage of steam remains unhindered.
smallDescription: Pentru instrumentele da Vinci
fullDescription:
Pungile Steriking au fost concepute pentru sterilizarea instrumentelor da Vinci S/Si, X/Xi si SP. De asemenea, pungile pot fi utilizate si pentru ambalarea altor dispozitive lungi care necesita protectie.
Instrumentele da Vinci S/Si, X/Xi si SP trebuie orientate cu tubulatura catre terminatia deschisa, pentru a asigura prezentare aseptica - usor de indepartat din ambalaj.
seoDescription: Masina de sigilat cu imprimanta incorporata Steriking Wipak.

name: Pungi pentru sterilizare
enfullDescription:
Infections are a high risk in healthcare and surgical operations. All medical devices and supplies must be sterile when in tended for use in invasive and open wound operations. A correctly designed sterile barrier system manu factured from reliable materials al lows efficient sterilization, provides physical protection, maintains sterility to the point of use and allows aseptic presentation. 

Safe handling and transportation of contaminated goods requires special care. Reusable surgical supplies and instruments have to be carefully cleaned and maintained after each use and to be sterilized prior to their next operation. Single use sterile barrier systems and materials offer proven microbial barrier properties. They ensure a very high degree of protection during storage, handling, transportation and aseptic opening. They are designed to allow complete penetration of the 
sterilizing agent into a pack and its products.

The Steriking product range offers a wide variety of types and sizes for the optimum choice of a correctly sized pack for each item and for double packing purposes.

Wipak’s peel pouches and rolls provide for an easy and fast packing process for individual instruments, smaller sets and other items while still offering reliable sterile barrier properties.

Mini patient monitor is lightweight and rugged to withstand accidental drops, meeting the needs of busy transport and mid-acuity environments. The patent-pending integrated intravenous (IV) pole mount and 8-inch touchscreen display with alarm light delivers vital information where you 
need it to be, at the bedside or on the go. With wireless networking and an integrated battery, Qube Mini supports transport up to five hours.

enfullDescription:
Small and lightweight with a battery life that goes the distance, Qube offers portability, accessibility and heightened connectivity - perfect for emergency-, general-, intensive- and post-anesthesia care units. Caregivers can access current, critical patient information - from bedside throughout transport -to provide an informed level of patient care.

Qube is mountable anywhere - wall, roll-stand, bed rail, anesthesia system - or can quickly be detached via a quick release feature for immediate mobility. Long battery life and dual battery capability keep Qube on the go everywhere your patient goes. Impact resistant, chemical resistant, and protected from liquid ingress, Qube endures even with heavy use. Full functionality in a compact package.
