name: Ranger - unitate de incalzire si administrare fluide
enSmallDescription:
Safe, effective
fluid warming
when you need it
enfullDescription:
The Ranger blood and fluid warming system helps clinicians to prevent further reduction in core temperature caused by cold fluids. We have a range of standard and high flow options available to deliver safe, effective warming for all patients - all in one system. 

The Ranger blood and fluid warming system allows you to warm fluids effectively without compromising patient safety. The microprocessor controlled heating system maintains plate temperature irrespective of flow rate or the temperature of the fluid bag. With bubble trap functionality in our standard and paediatric 
sets and air elimination feature in our high flow sets, you can protect your patients against the risk and dangers of air embolism.
smallDescription:
Incalzirea fluidelor
sigura si eficienta
atunci cand ai mai mare nevoie
fullDescription:
Sistemul de incalzire a sangelui si fluidelor 3M Ranger previne reducerea suplimentara a temperaturii centrale cauzate de fluide reci. Sunt disponibile variante cu debit standard si cu debit mare, pentru a asigura o incalzire sigura si eficienta pentru toti pacientii - toate intr-un singur sistem.

Sistemul de incalzire a sangelui si fluidelor, cu tehnologia de incalzire uscata, 3M Ranger foloseste placi de aluminiu in interiorul unitatii de incalzire. Fara baie de apa. Niciun risc potential de infectare asociat cu apa incalzita a baii de apa.

Conceptul revolutionar si placile de aluminiu din sistemul de incalzire a sangelui si fluidelor 3M Ranger care sunt spatiate perfect pentru a creea o zona maxima de contact alaturi de setul de incalzire, in timp ce permite un debit nerestrictionat de fluide. Sistemul de incalzire strans cuplat este foarte receptiv la modificari ale debitului sub orice conditie de incalzire a fluidelor. Sistemul de comanda bazat pe un microprocesor monitorizeaza sistemul temperaturii de patru ori pe secunda si este sensibil la variatii mici, precum 0.1°C. Acest lucru permite unitatii de incalzire sa creasca sau sa diminueze incalzirea precum si temperatura fluidului si schimbarea ratei debitului

Prevazute cu cale pentru fluid transparenta ajuta la identificarea si eliminarea rapida si usoara a eventualelor bule ce se pot crea in timpul umplerii liniei. Dispozitivele de spalare integrate pot fi actionate cu o singura mana, iar conectorul protejat previne deconectarile accidentale si patrunderea lichidelor la nivelul conexiunii.
Disponibile in multiple variante: celule simple / duble / triple, cu sau fara sistem in linie pentru prezervarea in circuit inchis a sangelui, pentru adulti / copii / nou-nascuti, in set complet ce include si liniile de presiune codificate color si liniile de umplere cu spike.

name: Sistem oncologic Diana ACS
enfullDescription:
Powerful medications used in cancer treatments are critical to patient care, but they also pose a safety risk to healthcare workers. Improve efficiency and safety with innovative technologies designed to complement the way you work today.

ICU Medical’s oncology systems deliver everything you need to standardize your IV oncology workflow. 
Diana drug compounding workflow system combines both automation and IV workflow technologies with wireless pharmacist notification to let you remotely verify preparations on a handheld tablet. You can streamline the flow of medications and data from pharmacy to administration with smart pump programming technology and IV pumps with complete IV-EHR interoperability.
smallDescription: Sistem automat pentru mixarea si preparare chimioterapie DIANA ACS - precizie si siguranta in terapia  oncologica

Tehnologia inovatoare permite standardizarea fluxului de preparare a solutiilor oncologice perfuzabile, umplerea pungilor, seringilor si a pompelor elastomerice cu aceste solutii, dar si verificarea wireless a medicatiei.
Prevazut cu biblioteca de medicamente si cu imprimanta asigura acuratetea prepararii medicatiei si trasabilitate. Seturile de consumabile contin elemente de siguranta de tip sistem inchis ChemoClave pentru evitarea picaturilor accidentale sau a vaporilor toxici.

name: SonoSite Edge II
enSmallDescription: Clear ultrasound diagnostics for those critical moments
enfullDescription:
The SonoSite EdgeII Ultrasound System offers you an enhanced imaging experience through 
industry-first transducer innovations like DirectClear and Armored Cable Technology. And, because 
it is a SonoSite, the EdgeII stays true to our design pillars of durability, reliability and ease of use.

DirectClear Technology is a novel, patent-pending process that elevates transducer performance:
Improved penetration and contrast resolution: Unlike conventional SonoSite transducers, a more efficient material has been embedded into the design that allows for the generation of more acoustic signal. In parallel, a reflective layer has been added to reduce the loss of this signal, as it is transmitted into the patient.
Sharpened detail resolution: An additional layer has been added to provide a better acoustic match between the transducer and the patient, increasing the ability to resolve small structures and aid in your diagnostic confidence.
smallDescription: Durabil, sigur, facil
fullDescription: Sistemul cu ultrasunete SonoSite Edge II ofera o experienta imbunatatita in imagistica medicala prin traductoarele inovative, tehnologia DirectClear si cablurile ranforsate. In plus, pentru ca poarta marca SonoSite, Edge II intruchipeaza principiile noastre de durabilitate, siguranta si utilizare facila.
seoDescription: Endoguide este un fir de ghidaj cu manevrare excelenta. Cel mai precis fir din gama Teleflex.

name: SonoSite M-Turbo
enSmallDescription: High resolution imaging across the point of care
enfullDescription:
Our most versatile system for abdominal, nerve, vascular, cardiac, venous access, pelvic, and superficial imaging. The M-Turbo ultrasound system gives you striking image quality with sharp contrast resolution and clear tissue delineation. This ultrasound equipment lets you visualize detail, improving your ability to differentiate structures, vessels and pathology. Because the more you can see, the more you can do for your patients.

The M-Turbo ultrasound system offers striking image quality. Proprietary algorithms optimize multiple imaging parameters so you get essential information quickly and easily.

TURBO TECHNOLOGY
SonoADAPT Tissue Optimization – eliminating complicated manipulation of multiple controls.
SonoHD Imaging Technology – reducing speckle noise and other image artifacts while preserving and sharpening tissue information.
SonoMB Multi-beam Imaging – increasing resolution of small structures and enhancing border delineation.
Advanced Needle Visualization – aiding needle visualization while maintaining striking image quality of the target and surrounding anatomy.
ColorHD Technology – increasing color performance, sensitivity and frame rates for more diagnostic information.
Point-of-Care Applications – Anesthesia, Critical Care, Cardiology, Cardiovascular Disease Management, Emergency Medicine, Musculoskeletal, OB/Gyn, Radiology, Vascular, Surgery, Vet Imaging, Women’s Health.
smallDescription: Durabil, fiabil si versatil
fullDescription: Sistemul nostru cel mai versatil pentru examinari abdominale, de nervi, vasculare, cardiace, de acces venos, pelvine si de imagistica superficiala. Sistemul cu ultrasunete M-Turbo va ofera o calitate extraordinara a imaginii, rezolutie de contrast si o delimitare clara a tesuturilor, astfel incat sa obtineti informatiile esentiale usor si rapid.
seoDescription: Ac de punctie pentru proceduri de nefrostomie in 2 sau 3 pasi.

name: SonoSite SII
enSmallDescription: Transforming the pace of your practice, through simply, smart ultrasound.
enfullDescription:
The SII empowers your efficiency through an intuitive, yet smart user interface that adapts to your imaging needs. The system is portable and can be used across multiple hospital environments, including a zero footprint option for space constrained rooms. We listened to you, and designed the SII system to maximize the productivity of your practice, and support you in providing simply the best patient care.

DirectClear Technology is a novel, patent-pending process that elevates transducer performance: Improved penetration and contrast resolution: Unlike conventional SonoSite transducers, a more efficient material has been embedded into the design that allows for the generation of more acoustic signal. In parallel, a reflective layer has been added to reduce the loss of this signal, as it is transmitted into the patient.

Sharpened detail resolution: An additional layer has been added to provide a better acoustic match between the transducer and the patient, increasing the ability to resolve small structures and aid in your diagnostic confidence.
smallDescription: Interfata intuitiva
fullDescription: SonoSite SII va imbunatateste eficienta printr-o interfata de utilizator intuitiva si in acelasi timp inteligenta, care se adapteaza nevoilor complexe in imagistica. Sistemul este mobil si poate fi utilizat in numeroase medii spitalicesti, prin optiunea de amprenta zero pentru camerele cu spatiu restrans.
seoDescription: Extractoare de calculi pentru tratamentul pietrlor de la ureter si richini.

name: SonoSite X-Porte
enfullDescription:
X-Porte represents an entirely new approach to clinical ultrasound. Its imaging, features and educational resources are fluidly brought together in a convenient, all-in-one kiosk design.

At the sweep of your hand, it responds so quickly and intelligently to your imaging needs, you’ll know it was created precisely for professionals like you. Its self-explanatory control panel makes system navigation a breeze, and its sealed touch screen has no buttons for pathogens to hide behind.

X-Porte’s slender profile makes it easy to maneuver alongside beds and exam tables for point-of-care visualization and procedures. For portability and durability during transport, its screen folds down and its stand lowers making X-Porte even more compact for navigating busy corridors. Securement Dressings combine infection reduction, securement, site visibility and breathability into one, easy-to-use product – to provide a more convenient and reliable solution for the securement and monitoring of catheters and other I.V. devices.

Pansamentul Tegaderm CHG consta intr-un pansament adeziv transparent si un pad cu gel integrat ce contine 2% gluconat de clorhexidina (CHG), un binecunoscut agent antiseptic cu activitate antimicrobiana si antifungica cu spectru larg cu posibilitate de mentinere pana la 7 zile.

Advanced protection for wounds and surgical incisions. These sterile, waterproof film dressings provide a bacterial and viral barrier. The unique absorbent pad won't stick to the wound. Suggested applications: post-surgical dressings - especially on areas where swelling or movement is expected, acute wounds, such as cuts and abrasions.

Available in a range of sizes and shapes
smallDescription: Pansament transparent cu pad absorbant

Sugestii de aplicare: pansamente post-chirurgicale - in special pe zonele in care se preconizeaza umflaturi sau miscari, rani acute, precum taieturi si zgarieturi. Fixare si coperirea dispozitivelor medicale.

name: Conector Tego
enfullDescription:
Designed to help protect your patients’ catheters from contamination and increased risk of catheter-related bloodstream infections (CRBSIs) during hemodialysis and apheresis applications.

The Tego needlefree connector creates a closed system when attached to the hub of a catheter to minimize contamination and help reduce the risk of CRBSIs. Tego’s saline flush option is designed to help reduce the risk of Heparin-Induced Thromobcytopenia (HIT) and helps you minimize overall hemodialysis costs by reducing heparin use.

Accessing the Fluid Path:
When Tego is not being accessed, the silicone seal forms a swabbable barrier to bacterial ingress.
Attaching a dialysis bloodline to Tego activates the straight internal fluid path and creates a mechanically and microbiologically closed system.
smallDescription: Conectori acces fara ac Tego - Reduc riscul infectiilor sanguine asociate hemodializei
fullDescription:
Conectorii pentru accesarea fara ac a cateterelor de hemodializa Tego reduc riscul infectiilor sanguine actionand ca o bariera de protectie antimicrobiana si reduc riscul de trombozare a cateterelor datorita tehnologiei "fara dislocuire" (conector neutru). Suprafata lor neteda permite dezinfectarea rapida si eficienta inainte de accesare, iar calea dreapta pentru fluid din interiorul lor permite curatarea fara reziduuri, facand suficienta spalarea doar cu solutie salina a cateterului si eliminand astfel riscurile asociate heparinizarii sistemice.
Compatibilitatea cu injectarile cu presiune de pana la 600ml/min si durata de folosire de pana la 7 zile ofera acestor conectori posibilitatea de utilizare pe intreaga durata a aferezei / hemodializei.

enfullDescription:

smallDescription: Indicator test pentru sterilizarea cu peroxid de hidrogen/plasma clasa 4
fullDescription:
Indicatorul test pentru sterilizarea cu peroxid de hidrogen/plasma de la Browne este destinat utilizarii pentru monitorizarea sistemului de sterilizare la temperatura joasa. name: Sterilant Vaprox HC
enfullDescription:
Vaprox HC Sterilant, containing 59% Hydrogen Peroxide, is a hydrogen peroxide sterilant designed specifically for use in the V-PRO maX, V-PRO maX 2, V-PRO s2, V-PRO 1 Plus, V-PRO 60 and V-PRO 1 Low Temperature Sterilization Systems. Over 40 materials and coatings now compatible with Vaprox HC Sterilant.

The smart cup Vaprox HC Sterilant (PB011 and PB012) is designed to help save time and expense from wasted hydrogen peroxide sterilant. The smart VHP sterilant cup is equipped with RFID technology to automatically identify if you are running low on sterilant or the expiration date is approaching, to better maximize sterilant usage.

How Vaprox HC Sterilant Works
Hydrogen Peroxide is a well characterized sterilant that demonstrates broad-spectrum efficacy against viruses, bacteria, yeasts and bacterial spores. Microbicidal activity is increased in the gaseous phase, where hydrogen peroxide acts as an oxidant attacking membrane lipids, DNA and other essential cell components.
smallDescription: Peroxid de hidrogen
fullDescription: Sterilantul Vaprox HC, care contine 59% peroxid de hidrogen, este conceput special pentru utilizare cu sisteme de sterilizare la temperatura joasa V-PRO maX, V-PRO maX 2, V-PRO s2, V-PRO 1 Plus, V-PRO 60 si V-PRO 1. Peste 40 de materiale si invelisuri ale acestora acum compatibile cu Sterilizantul Vaprox HC.

name: Vellafilm
enfullDescription:
Vellafilm is a transparent atraumatic polyurethane film dressing with Silfix soft silicone adherence. It is designed to protect the wound whilst minimising the pain and trauma associated with dressing change.
The soft silicone will adhere to surrounding dry skin but not to a moist wound. The clear film exhibits the optimum moisture vapour transfer rate. The dressing is transparent allowing observation of the wound site or primary dressing minimising dressing change frequency. The film backing acts as a bacterial barrier and has a low coefficient of friction to reduce potential tissue damage from sheer or friction.

Indications: superficial epithelialising wounds, retention of primary wound contact layers and absorbent dressings, surgical wounds

CR3919 - 12cm x 12cm 
CR3921 - 15cm x 20cm 
CR3917 - 12cm x 35cm
smallDescription: Pansament transparent de protectie de tip film
fullDescription:
Pansamentul Vellafilm este un film de poliuretan transparent de protectie cu strat atraumatic aderent din silicon moale Silfix. Este conceput sa protejeze rana si sa ofere o schimbare atraumatica a pansamentului siliconul aderand doar de tesutul uscat din jurul plagii. Permite un transfer optim al vaporilor, fiind impremeabil pentru bacterii. 
Disponibil in diferite dimensiuni. Poate fi mentinut pana la 7 zile.

name: Stapler tegument Visistat
enfullDescription:
Teleflex’s Weck Visistat skin stapler meets both needs, the surgeon’s for a safe and easy-to-use instrument and the patient’s for quick recovery. 
Each disposable Visistat skin stapler is loaded with 35 either regular or wide medical grade stainless steel staples that can be used in a wide range of surgical procedures. 

The precision instrument features a see-through window for better visibility and a patented non-stop 
feed mechanism for easy release and reduced jamming. 
Thanks to sharper staples, an easy and less traumatic penetration of the tissue can be effected. Finally, even their removal turns out to become a less painful procedure, due to their tallness.
smallDescription: Dispozitiv de inchidere tegument preincarcat cu clipuri
fullDescription: Dispozitiv de inchidere tegument preincarcat cu 35 de clipuri metalice inalte si ascutite pentru penetrarea atraumatica a tegumentului. Dispozitiv cu alimentare automata si cu fereastra de vizualizare pentru control vizual al incarcarii clipului. Disponibil in 2 variante (clipuri in 2 dimensiuni diferite).

name: Sterilizator V-Pro maX 2
enfullDescription:
Delivering unparalleled productivity for day-to-day Operating Room needs, the V-PRO maX 2 Low Temperature Sterilization System is designed for use in terminal sterilization of medical devices. Steris’s V-PRO maX 2 Sterilizer features the new Fast Non Lumen Cycle allowing you to sterilize devices like cameras, telescopes, batteries and laryngoscope blades in just 16 minutes.

The V-PRO maX 2 Sterilizer is a hydrogen peroxide sterilizer that provides four cycles to efficiently sterilize the widest range of instruments and devices, using Steris proprietary vaporized hydrogen peroxide technology:

Fast Non Lumen Cycle – Reprocess up to 5 Kg of non lumen devices in 16 minutes
Non Lumen Cycle – Reprocess up to 22.7 Kg of non lumen devices in 28 minutes
Flexible Cycle – Reprocess up to 11 Kg of mixed loads in 35 minutes
Lumen Cycle – Reprocess up to 20 stainless steel lumened surgical instruments in 52 minutes

The innovative Moisture Check is included in every cycle to help confirm loads are dry and prevent cycle aborts. The Fast Non Lumen Cycle, only available with the V-PRO maX 2 Sterilizer, uses half the sterilant compared to all other V-PRO Sterilizer cycles.
smallDescription: Cel mai rapid ciclu de sterilizare
fullDescription:
Sterilizatorul V-PRO maX 2 este un sterilizator cu peroxid de hidrogen care ofera patru cicluri pentru a steriliza eficient cea mai larga gama de instrumente si dispozitive, utilizand peroxid de hidrogen vaporizat:

Ciclu rapid fara lumen - sterilizeaza pana la 5 Kg de dispozitive fara lumen in 16 minute
Ciclu fara lumen - sterilizeaza pana la 22.7 Kg de dispozitive fara lumen in 28 de minute
Ciclu flexibil - sterilizeaza pana la 11 Kg de incarcaturi mixte in 35 de minute
Ciclu lumen - sterilizeaza pana la 20 de instrumente chirurgicale cu lumen din otel inoxidabil in 52 de minute

name: Xlimus
enSmallDescription: Sirolimus-eluting cobalt chromium coronary stent technology
enfullDescription:
XLIMUS abluminal drug-coating technology.
Sirolimus-eluting cobalt chromium coronary stent technology.

A novel drug-eluting, cobalt chromium coronary stent system, which provides clinically effective antiproliferative, abluminal drug delivery to the coronary artery lesion to prevent restenosis, followed by a rapid functional endothelial healing.

XLIMUS assists the cardiologist with an optimal, unsurpassed tracking performance. It has an innovative Hydrophilic-coated shaft and an extra-low tip profile to access the most tortuous lesions. The ultra-low lesion crossing profile measures only 0.90 mm. The novel XLIMUS Sirolimus-eluting coronary stent system protects the stented lesion segment through extraordinary homogeneous vessel wall scaffolding which minimizes the risk of tissue prolapse.

Optimized thin stent strut design of 0.0029"
smallDescription: Stent coronarian din crom cobalt cu elutie de sirolimus
fullDescription: Un nou sistem de stent coronarian din crom cobalt cu elutie de medicament, care asigura livrarea medicamentului antiproliferativ, abluminal si eficient din punct de vedere clinic, la leziunea arterei coronare pentru a preveni restenoza, urmata de o vindecare functionala rapida a endoteliului. Un sistem de stent revolutional pentru tratarea leziunilor coronariene complexe cu tehnologia stentului coronarian din crom cobalt cu elutie de sirolimus.
seoDescription: Legflow este un balon acoperit cu medicament, mai eficient decat cele cu invelis DCB, ce ajuta la vindecarea rapida dupa angioplastie.
